{Xiane}

    Xiane closed on the laughing Zergling, ignoring the explosion as
friendly fire did more damage than good, he came fully aware of why he never
carried projectile weapons.

    The tip of the glowing energon sword stoof mere inches from Zerglings
face as the robotic knight stood over him looking down. "I shalt not advise
thee to reach for any weaponry or to even make thine eyes glow for surely as
this blade hovers above you know that I shalt take such action as a move to
attack and thine spark shalt be sent to the matrix forth with."

    Xiane looked down darkly, "And in case of thine speech filters not
working I shalt spell it out for thee. You and thine friend shalt not move
or surely thou shalt be the first to die. And with three on one thine friend
is surely following soon after. Thine choice is thus, surrender or be put
permanently offline. I'll have thine decision now..."
